stories.text:
Hi there,

A founder of AI text writing assistant startup here. We have a small team of 4 experienced tech / non-tech co-founders, 70% MVP done, a unique text analysis tool based on the mix of GPT-3 and top language models, a set of tools similar to conversion.ai, but more focused on a narrow segment of the market and a queue of 45 early users (trial period).

We exhausted our small FFF (friends, fools, family) $10k budget fast and had to switch to outsourcing development (as we worked before) to survive.

The question is: we still believe that we have a great potential to create so many incredible and valuable things in the scope of this product, we implemented like 0.000000000001% of what we can.

What is the fastest way to get $25k-50k investment to expand our startup and release the first public product version? Crowdfunding? Accelerators? Private investors?

Thanks.

Michael mksl@pm.me
stories.title: Ask HN: Fastest way to get funding for a startup with the queue of early users?
Comparing the Size of the World’s Rockets, Past and Present
The Absent-Minded Father of Cybernetics, Norbert Wiener
